item.description:
Inquisitive Minds Ltd. is starting an airline.  To keep the carbon foot print of our new fleet very small, we want new innovative aircrafts made from recycled materials.  

So this Friday instead of debating lofty ideas, we'll be having fun making paper airplanes!

Since we are looking for cool designs, clever craftpersonship, and eye catching aircraft, this we'll be a 2 part contest.


Inquisitive Minds Air X Prize Challenge 1: Longest Flight

Inquisitive Minds Air X Prize Challenge 2: Coolest Craft
(art work, fanciful design, etc.). Here the emphasis is on aspects less aeronautic, more on illustration, color, humor, and whim.





Rules:

Aircraft must be substantially made at the Meetup.
Nothing unsafe (no fire, chemicals, etc)
How much cheating will be allowed will be decided by the group
Have fun

The group will vote the winning entry for the two categories.
In the event of a tie, the moderator will cast a deciding vote.

Some paper, scissors, markers, crayons, tape, etc will be provided.
Feel free to bring paper, scissors, wire, trained bees, paint, clouds, and other supplies you wish.

Here are some web sites for inspiration:
http://www.omniwing.c...

http://www.paperairpl...

http://www.paperairpl...
item.how_to_find_us: Look for us at the large table all the way in back
item.name: Inquisitive Minds Air X Prize Challenge!
